info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service - Analyze Conversations Authoring
info.description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection and question answering. Further documentation can be found in https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/language-service/overview.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringConfusionMat.description: Represents a cell in a confusion matrix.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringConversation.description: Represents an entity with its components.

compositionSetting.description: The behavior to follow when the entity's components overlap with each other.

entities.description: The list component of the entity.

regex.description: The regex component of the entity.

requiredComponents.description: The required components. Allowed values are 'learned', 'list', 'prebuilts' and 'regex'.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringConversation.description: Represents an exported intent of a conversational project.
Represents the exported assets of a conversational project.

intents.description: The intents defined in the project.

entities.description: The entities defined in the project.

utterances.description: The utterances defined in the project.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringConversation.description: Represents an exported utterance for a conversational project.

entities.description: Represents the entity labels of the utterance.

language.description: Represents the utterance's language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

dataset.description: The dataset for this utterance. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringCreateDeploy.description: Represents the options for creating or updating a project deployment.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringCreateProjec.description: Represents the options used to create or update a project.

multilingual.description: Whether the project would be used for multiple languages or not.

language.description: The project language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringDeploymentJo.description: Represents the state of a deployment job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringEntitiesEval.description: Represents the evaluation result summary for the project's entities.

confusionMatrix.description: Represents the confusion matrix between two entities (the two entities can be the same). The matrix is between the entity that was labelled and the entity that was predicted.

microF1.description: Represents the micro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microPrecision.description: Represents the micro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microRecall.description: Represents the micro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroF1.description: Represents the macro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroPrecision.description: Represents the macro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroRecall.description: Represents the macro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringEntityEvalua.description: Represents the evaluation result for an entity.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringEvaluationOp.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

kind.description: Represents the evaluation kind. By default, the evaluation kind is set to percentage.

trainingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the training dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

testingSplitPercentage.description: Represents the testing dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the evaluation kind is percentage.

entitiesEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to entities evaluation.

intentsEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to intents evaluation.

evaluationOptions.description: The options that were used while running the evaluation.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportProjec.description: Represents the state of an export job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

resultUrl.description: The URL to use in order to download the exported project.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedConv.description: Defines the orchestration details for a Conversational project target.

projectName.description: The name of the targeted project.

deploymentName.description: The name of the targeted deployment.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedConv.description: Represents the orchestration options for a Conversational project target.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedEnti.description: Represents a list component of an entity.

sublists.description: The sub-lists of the list component.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedEnti.description: Represents a list of synonyms inside a list component

language.description: Represents the language of the synonyms. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

values.description: The list of synonyms.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedEnti.description: Represents a regex component of an entity.

expressions.description: The regex expressions of the regex component. These expressions follow the .NET regex syntax. For reference, check here: https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expressions

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedEnti.description: Represents a regex expression inside a regex component. This expression follows the .NET regex syntax. For reference, check here: https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expressions

regexKey.description: The key of the regex expression.

language.description: Represents the language of the regex expression. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedEnti.description: Represents a sub-list inside a list component.

synonyms.description: The phrases of that correspond to the sub-list.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedLuis.description: Defines the orchestration details for a LUIS application target.
Represents the orchestration options for a LUIS application target.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedOrch.description: Represents the options used to define the orchestration behavior of an intent.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedPreb.description: Represents an exported prebuilt entity component

projectFileVersion.description: The version of the exported file.

stringIndexType.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedProj.description: Represents the assets of an exported project.

projectKind.description: The type of project containing the assets.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedQues.description: Defines the orchestration details for a Question Answering project target.

projectName.description: The name of the target project.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedQues.description: Represents the orchestration options for a Question Answering project target.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringExportedUtte.description: Represents an entity label for an utterance.

category.description: The category of the entity label.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringIntentEvalua.description: The evaluation summary for an intent.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringIntentsEvalu.description: Represents the evaluation summary for the project's intents.

confusionMatrix.description: Represents the confusion matrix between two intents (the two intents can be the same). The matrix is between the intent that was labelled and the intent that was predicted.

microF1.description: Represents the micro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microPrecision.description: Represents the micro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microRecall.description: Represents the micro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroF1.description: Represents the macro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroPrecision.description: Represents the macro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroRecall.description: Represents the macro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringLoadSnapshot.description: Represents the state of loading a snapshot job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringOrchestratio.description: Represents an exported intent for an orchestration project.

orchestration.description: Specifies the behavior of this intent in the orchestration flow.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringOrchestratio.description: Represents the assets of an orchestration project.

intents.description: Represents the intents of the project.

utterances.description: Represents the utterances of the project.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringOrchestratio.description: Represents an utterance of an orchestration project.

language.description: Represents the utterance's language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

dataset.description: The dataset for this utterance. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringProjectDelet.description: Represents the state of a project deletion job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

deploymentExpirationDate.description: Represents deployment expiration date in the runtime.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringProjectMetad.description: Represents the metadata of a project.

lastTrainedDateTime.description: Represents the project last trained datetime.

lastDeployedDateTime.description: Represents the project last deployed datetime.

multilingual.description: Whether the project would be used for multiple languages or not.

language.description: The project language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringProjectSetti.description: Represents the settings used to define the project behavior.

confidenceThreshold.description: The threshold of the intent with the highest confidence, at which the prediction will automatically be changed to "None". The value of the threshold should be between 0 and 1 inclusive.

lastTrainedDateTime.description: The last trained date time of the model.

lastTrainingDurationInSeconds.description: The duration of the model's last training request in seconds.

hasSnapshot.description: The flag to indicate if the trained model has a snapshot ready.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringSubTrainingJ.description: Represents the detailed state of a training sub-operation.

status.description: Represents the status of the sub-operation.

languageCode.description: The language code. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringSwapDeployme.description: Represents the state of a deployment job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringSwapDeployme.description: Represents the options for swapping two deployments together.

trainingConfigVersion.description: Represents the version of the config.

modelExpirationDate.description: Represents the training config version expiration date.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringTrainingJobO.description: Represents the options for starting a new training job.

trainingConfigVersion.description: Represents training config version. By default, "latest" value is used which uses the latest released training config version.

trainingMode.description: Represents the mode of the training operation.

evaluationOptions.description: Represents the evaluation options. By default, the evaluation kind is percentage, with training split percentage as 80, and testing split percentage as 20.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringTrainingJobR.description: Represents the output of a training job.

trainingMode.description: Represents the mode of the training operation.

estimatedEndDateTime.description: Represents the estimated end date time for training and evaluation.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringTrainingJobS.description: Represents the state of a training job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringUtteranceEnt.description: Represents the comparison between the expected and predicted entities for an utterance.
Represents the evaluation output of an entity label or prediction.

offset.description: Represents the entity offset index relative to the original text.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringUtteranceEva.description: Represents the evaluation result for an utterance.

language.description: Represents the utterance language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

entitiesResult.description: Represents the entities results for the utterance.

intentsResult.description: Represents the intents results for the utterance.

AnalyzeConversationAuthoringUtteranceInt.description: Represents the comparison between the expected and the predicted intent for an utterance.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: returnLongestOverlap
values.description: When two or more components are found in the text and overlap, the component with the longest set of characters is returned.

values.name: requireExactOverlap
values.description: All components must overlap at the exact same characters in the text for the entity to return. If one of the defined components is not matched or predicted, the entity will not return.

values.name: separateComponents
values.description: Every component's match or prediction is returned as a separate instance of the entity.

values.name: combineComponents
values.description: When two or more components are found in the text and overlap, the components' spans are merged together into one span combining all of them.

DatasetType.description: The dataset for this utterance. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

values.name: Train
values.description: Split the data into training and test sets according to user-defined percentages.

values.name: Test
values.description: Split the data according to the chosen dataset for every example in the data.

values.name: percentage
values.description: Split the data into training and test sets according to user-defined percentages.

values.name: manual
values.description: Split the data according to the chosen dataset for every example in the data.

values.name: Conversation
values.description: A project to build natural language into apps, bots, and IoT devices.

values.name: Orchestration
values.description: A project to connect and orchestrate Conversation, Custom question answering and LUIS projects together in one single project.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

values.name: advanced
values.description: Trains using fine-tuned neural network transformer models. Can train multilingual projects.

values.name: standard
values.description: Faster training times for quicker iterations.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.name: maxpagesize
Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.description: The maximum number of result items per page.

Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.name: skip
Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to skip.

Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.name: top
Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to return.

values.name: Conversation
values.description: A project to build natural language into apps, bots, and IoT devices.

values.name: Orchestration
values.description: A project to connect and orchestrate Conversation, Custom question answering and LUIS projects together in one single project.

StringIndexTypeQueryParameter.name: stringIndexType
StringIndexTypeQueryParameter.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

SupportedPrebuiltEntitiesQueryParameter..name: language
SupportedPrebuiltEntitiesQueryParameter..description: The language to get supported prebuilt entities for. Required if multilingual is false. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

SupportedPrebuiltEntitiesQueryParameter..name: multilingual
SupportedPrebuiltEntitiesQueryParameter..description: Whether to get the support prebuilt entities for multilingual or monolingual projects. If true, the language parameter is ignored.
